home.short_t1: As a proficient Developer, I have a passion for visually appealing and user-friendly websites, applications and other types of projects. Proven my ability to deliver high-quality work, adapt to new technologies, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and stay currently with industry trends.
home.short_t2: I am a young software-engineer student, at the beginning of my career, having a ton of ambitious ideas and the motivation and discipline to realize them in management, design and development.

footer.hope_you_liked: Hope you liked my portfolio website. Feel free to suggest improvements or just to chat.
